name: Unit Network
description: UNIT Price Live Data Unit Network is a leading economic network, marketplace and exchange with powerful tools for creators and communities to make their own currencies and transfer value in new ways. Like Wordpress or Wix for webpages, Unit Network empowers users to seamlessly create and manage a token value ecosystem that digitally represents value captured by an industry, city, business, brand, personal identity, idea, or anything else one can imagine. Web3 is rapidly monetising culture and intangible assets in way previously not possible. Music, art, film, performance, literature, journalism are among a few that are set to completely revolutionise. Unit Network allows this IP to become extremely liquid / tradable in a global marketplace accessible to anyone in the world.
